fullplot: Director/Producer and creator of "The Room," Tommy Wiseau gives us "Homeless In America," a documentary about people who are homeless and those who help them. "Homeless In America" underlines the huge hidden problem of the homeless. Tommy Wiseau gives us "Homeless In America" as it is, real people, real lives.
plot: A documentary about people who are homeless and those who help them. Don't give the homeless a hand out; give them a hand up.
title: Homeless in America
